biography: Glüme Harlow was born and raised in the city of angels. Getting her first taste of the silver screen as a child actress, she juggled time between training her voice, exploring music & wrestling with her health. Her various autoimmune issues eventually evolved into a heart disease known as Prinzmetal. She doesn't feel her body and soul are quite comparable with this world...but she loves visiting and writing about the people here. Her music collides at the crossroads where tomorrow has forgotten yesterday.
name: Glüme Harlow
